meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>home country</kanji> <kanji>person</kanji> is a <vocabulary>fellow countryman</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>compatriot</vocabulary> (only for Japanese people though). In Japan, you're a <vocabulary>Japanese national</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
